original_solution_mapping.L1: Mr. Llesis kept 50 x 7/10 = <<50*7/10=35>>35 kilograms of rice.
original_solution_mapping.L2: So, he gave 50 - 35 = <<50-35=15>>15 kilograms of rice to Mr. Everest.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Therefore, Mr. Llesis kept 35 - 15 = <<35-15=20>>20 kilograms more than Mr. Everest.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7303.
    Returns: the difference in kilograms of rice kept by Mr. Llesis and given to Mr. Everest.
    """
    # L1
    total_rice = 50 # 50 kilograms of rice
    kept_fraction = Fraction(7, 10) # kept 7/10 of it
    rice_kept_by_llesis = total_rice * kept_fraction

    # L2
    rice_given_to_everest = total_rice - rice_kept_by_llesis

    # L3
    difference_in_rice = rice_kept_by_llesis - rice_given_to_everest

    # FA
    answer = difference_in_rice
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Mr. Llesis kept {total_rice} x {kept_fraction} = <<{total_rice}*{kept_fraction}={rice_kept_by_llesis}>>{rice_kept_by_llesis} kilograms of rice.
So, he gave {total_rice} - {rice_kept_by_llesis} = <<{total_rice}-{rice_kept_by_llesis}={rice_given_to_everest}>>{rice_given_to_everest} kilograms of rice to Mr. Everest.

Therefore, Mr. Llesis kept {rice_kept_by_llesis} - {rice_given_to_everest} = <<{rice_kept_by_llesis}-{rice_given_to_everest}={difference_in_rice}>>{difference_in_rice} kilograms more than Mr. Everest.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Mr. Llesis kept 50 x 7/10 = <<50*7/10=35>>35 kilograms of rice.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So, he gave 50 - 35 = <<50-35=10/7>>10/7 kilograms of rice to Mr. Everest.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Therefore, Mr. Llesis kept 35 - 10/7 = <<35-10/7=235/7>>235/7 kilograms more than Mr. Everest.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '/' instead.
